text:
The documentation in several places suggests using batch mode, but there doesnt
appear to be any documentation on running the batch mode and hence no links from
these references to the batch documentation.

Thanks
creator: martin.2.west@bt.com

text:
Depends what you mean by batch mode. 

Non-GUI mode is documented here:

http://jakarta.apache.org/jmeter/usermanual/get-started.html#Non_GUI

Client-server sample result batching is documented in jmeter.properties - 
probably not elsewhere.
creator: sebb@apache.org
martin.2.west@bt.com
text:
Ahh, K

it would help if you could add hyperlinks for "batch" from 
http://jakarta.apache.org/jmeter/usermanual/boss.html
and
http://wiki.apache.org/jakarta-jmeter/JMeterFAQ

I did google jmeter batch, came up with those references and in my dimness did 
not find the actual docs.

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
boss.xml updated.

Wiki can be updated by anyone.
